      • getManagerAttributes

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getManagerAttributes()
        Returns a map of string representations of player attribute names and values for displaying in the player manager. If you want an attribute to appear in the manager, just add it to the map (but please don't mess with other attributes). Attributes will appear in the order they are added
        Returns:
        The map of string representation of player attribute names and values
